message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $110. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer of $105. I really like the product, but I'm trying to stay within a tight budget. Can you meet me at $105?
I can see you really like the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about I meet you at $108? It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $106? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to compromise to make it work.
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make one more concession. How about I meet you at $107? It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it.
